title: Cozinha Consciente
typeOfFood: Vegan, Macrobiotic, Western, Take-out, Catering, Portuguese
description: Located inside the centre Galarias Topazio where you have to go up the stairs to the 2nd floor. Quiet setting, has Wi-Fi. Serves organic vegan cuisine with macrobiotic inspiration. Workshops and nutrition advice available. Reproted Sept 2014 changed from vegetarian to vegan menu and changed owner from previous Menu Verde. Confrimed open, Aug 2015.
